title: Formal parameter definitions
description: A map where each key declares a parameter or context object by its name and the value contains a reference to the XDM model, i.e. the symbol's type.

xdm-parameter-definitions-mixin.title: Formal parameter definitions
xdm-parameter-definitions-mixin.description: A map where each key declares a formal parameter or context object by its name and the value contains a reference to the XDM model, i.e. the parameter's or context object's type.

xdm:definedOn.title: Formal parameter definitions
xdm:definedOn.description: A map where each key declares a formal parameter or context object by its name and the value contains a reference to the XDM model, i.e. the parameter's or context object's  type.

parameter-definition-datatype.title: Formal parameter schema and schema usage
parameter-definition-datatype.description: Contains a valid XDM schema identifier or XDM type definition for the parameter or context object.

xdm:schema.title: Formal parameter schema
xdm:schema.description: Schema for the value of the parameter or context object. It is either a reference to a registered schema definition or a schema defined directly in the 'xdm:schema' property. The schema complies with the http://json-schema.org/draft-06/schema# schema.

$ref.title: Schema identifier
$ref.description: The schema reference used in this definition.

meta:altId.title: XED encoded schema identifier
meta:altId.description: An XED encoded variant of the schema reference used in this definition.

version.title: XDM schema version
version.description: Schema version which can be a revision number or git repo release tag number etc. This should be the same version number as part of the schema id

items.description: A fully qualified JSON path to an XDM field with dots used as the path delimiter.
